author: Buddha
message: Three things cannot be long hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth.
title: Thought of the day

author: Dalai Lama
message: More often than not, anger is actually an indication of weakness rather than of strength.
title: Thought of the day

author: Jim Beggs
message: Before you put on a frown, make absolutely sure there are no smiles available.
title: Thought of the day

author: Donald Kircher
message: A man of ability and the desire to accomplish something can do anything.
title: Thought of the day
